thread.section_title: Easy Tours of India Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Easy Tours of India | easytoursofindia.com
thread.title: Sharon Turshen
thread.title_full: Easy Tours of India reviewed by Sharon Turshen

author: Sharon Turshen
title: Sharon Turshen
text:
The trip was well organized and the logistics impeccable which resulted in a smooth trip from start to finish. The guides were terrific (especially in Varanasi, Jaipur and Udaipur),and we loved our driver Deepak. These folks went above and beyond to make our trip as easy and enjoyable as possible. Our sincerest thanks to you and everyone who helped make our trip so memorable. We will be sure to refer friends to your company.
Sharon
